# Armor Enhancement, Greater (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[3rd Level Artificer Spells|Artificer 3]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 6th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 6]]

**Casting Time:** 1 minute

**Components:** S, M (an ointment costing 100 gp)

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Armor or shield touched

**Duration:** 10 minutes/level

**Saving Throw:** None (object)

**Spell Resistance:** No (object)

**Source:** Eberron Campaign Setting (WotC), pg. 109

As *[[Armor Enhancement, Lesser (Spell)|lesser armor enhancement]]**,* but you can choose any special ability whose market price is equivalent to a bonus of up to +5 or up to 100,000 gp, such as *[[Etherealness (Arm_ShldSpcAb)|etherealness]]* or *[[Energy Resistance, Greater (Arm_ShldSpcAb)|greater fire resistance]]*.
